Job Title: Inventory Control Clerk - 3rd Shift Receiving

Location: Griffin, GA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Career Area

Operations

Job Description

 Your Work Shapes the World at Caterpillar Inc. 

When you join Caterpillar, you're joining a global team who cares not just about the work we do – but also about each other. We are the makers, problem solvers, and future world builders who are creating stronger, more sustainable communities. We don't just talk about progress and innovation here – we make it happen, with our customers, where we work and live. Together, we are building a better world, so we can all enjoy living in it.

Job Summary

The material IRA/counter position is responsible for maintaining inventory accuracy, counts, verifying materials and shipments, accessing computers to update material inventory information.

Available positions are located at our Griffin Warehouse at 375 Green Valley Road, Griffin, GA 30224

Available Shifts

 3rd: Sunday through Thursday, 7:30pm to 6:00am 

Responsibilities

 Job Responsibilities to include but are not limited to: 

 Obtain, move, relocate, and input materials accurately to and from work areas.  Completion of all OSHA and company required training.  Driving Forklifts to access material. 

Basic Qualifications

 Intermediate skills operating a computer. (Excel, Outlook, Word)  Previous inventory/reconciling experience is a plus. 

Top Candidates Will Also Have

 Strong organizational skills  Ability to communicate effectively in writing and orally.  Must be a self-starter who can work independently.  Ability to troubleshoot issues by interacting with others.  Familiarity with interpretation of Assembly Planning documentation 

Physical Requirements

 Candidates for all positions must have the ability to work in a fast pace, medium to heavy duty assembly, technical environment.  Work may involve frequent bending, stooping, and kneeling, twisting, turning, climbing, and standing on concrete for 10 hours.  All positions also require the ability to lift up to 25 lbs. and withstand frequent repetitive movement of hands with a variety of tooling. 

Compensation And Benefits

 Starting wage is $18.39/hour (paid bi-weekly)  Overtime opportunities paid at time and a half (some may be mandatory)  Medical, dental, vision and prescription benefits starting day 1  6% company match for 401k  Annual increases, based on your performance evaluation  Time Off (Vacation & PTO) and Paid Holidays  Employee Assistance Programs providing financial advice, personal and group therapy, etc.  College tuition assistance program available after 1 year employment 

Resume Required For Consideration

 All eligible candidates   MUST   pass the following pre-employment screenings before they can be hired to Caterpillar: 

 Background Screening  Drug Screening  Post-Offer Medical Questionnaire - clearance from Corporate Medical 

Caterpillar is committed to a diverse and inclusive workplace. Caterpillar is an equal opportunity employer and does not discriminate on the basis of race, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, protected veteran status, disability, age or other legally protected status. All qualified individuals are encouraged to apply.

Caterpillar is not currently hiring individuals for this position who now or in the future require sponsorship for employment-based non-immigrant and immigrant visas. However, as a global company, Caterpillar offers many job opportunities outside of the U.S. which can be found through our employment website

Relocation reimbursement is not offered for this position.

Your work ethic, commitment to quality and eagerness to learn will help our customers  do work that matters. Apply now! 

Posting Dates

April 18, 2024 - April 25, 2024

Any offer of employment is conditioned upon the successful completion of a drug screen.

EEO/AA Employer. All qualified individuals - Including minorities, females, veterans and individuals with disabilities - are encouraged to apply.

Not ready to apply? Join our Talent Community .

Experience Level (if available): None
